thread.title: Honda Activa drives past 1-crore sales milestone
thread.title_full: Honda Activa drives past 1-crore sales milestone | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Honda Activa drives past 1-crore sales milestone
text:
Other Articles Is Ford Figo Aspire better than Maruti Suzuki Swift, Hyundai Xcent, others? 5 power points 'New' Ford Endeavour gets featured on carmaker’s India website High-tech cars bring Detroit, Silicon Valley face to face Honda Motorcycle & Scooter India (HMSI) today said its scooter model Activa has crossed 1-crore sales mark.
Honda Activa, which comes with various features including four-stroke engine and gearless transmission, made its debut in the domestic market in 2001.
HMSI President and CEO Keita Muramatsu said the achievement is significant since Activa has gained the trust of 1 crore happy families in India.
“From reactivating the scooter segment in India in 2001 to leading the scooterisation of industry today, Honda’s iconic Activa has changed the way Indians ride to fulfil their dreams,” he added.
HMSI Senior Vice-President, Sales and Marketing, Yadvinder Singh Guleria said: “A decade ago, who would have bet that a scooter would once again be the largest selling two-wheeler in India? But today, Activa has broken the glass ceiling.”
Honda had sold 55,000 units of Activa in the first year of its launch (2001-02). Last fiscal, the company sold over 21 lakh units in the domestic market.
 18, 2015 4:51 pm
